alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:52PM MDT until June 06 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 452 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Badlands National Park, or 41 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kyle, Kyle North Route Housing and Yellow Bear Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
